abstract: Baseball Roundup; Los Angeles Dodgers joint owners Frank and Jamie McCourt settle their divorce case, resolving one major issue hovering over the club; other MLB news noted.
snippet: The settlement between Frank and Jamie McCourt will include her receiving about $130 million from Frank in return for Jamie giving up her interest in the team.
lead_paragraph: The settlement between Frank and Jamie McCourt will include her receiving about $130 million from Frank in return for Jamie giving up her interest in the team.

headline.main: McCourts Complete Divorce, With Frank Taking Dodgers
headline.print_headline: McCourts Complete Divorce, With Frank Taking Dodgers
headline.seo: McCourts’ Divorce Case Is Complete, Giving Frank Control of the Dodgers
